comment._content: this is a mosque , no church

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: The descriptions for this image were transcribed from the labels found on the actual lantern slide. We try to convey the original context with the images. It is still referred to today as both the Chora Church or Chora Mosque. Here is a link with more information on its history . Thanks for your comments. Angie Park Brooklyn Museum Archivist
